name: Ski-box
description:
Submitted initially for Mini Game Jam 86

Box rocket gloves to win the tournament!

Keep moving in order to build up power for your next punch, then swing away! Make sure you're punching the right way otherwise you won't do much damage.

Set your own score goal on the title screen! Make it (almost)as easy or hard as you want!

Controls:
Left/Right mouse click: Left/Right hook (incoming gloves require a specific punch direction)
A/D: Move left/right
R: Restart back to title

Credits:
"A Journey Awaits" by Pierre Bondoerffer (@pbondoer)
"Victory!" by Jon K. Fite
